summary: Ancient Falmer Bow for your Ancient Falmer Armor Set :D
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=white][font=\"Georgia\"][size=5]Ancient Falmer Bow for your Ancient Falmer Armor Set :D

Here\'s an awesome Ancient Falmer Bow for your Ancient Falmer Armor Set

Addaed 2 versions : 

1st.  Unenchanted Ancient Falmer Bow (base dmg 19 + 40 crit dmg)

2nd. Enchanted Ancient Falmer Bow (base dmg 20 + 40 crit dmg)

Enchanted version has neverbeforeseen :D enchantment that gives your targets :
75% Weakness to Magic for 25 secons with awesome shader for it.
Best use it when traveling with follower who uses magic.

Peace out.....[/size][/color][/font][/i]
author: droot
